property.name: paEntName
property.formula: (SELECT L.PA_ENT_NAME FROM T_CONTRACT_LEASE L LEFT JOIN T_EQUIPMENT_FLOW EF ON EF.CONTRACT_ID=L.CONTRACT_ID LEFT JOIN T_EQUIPMENT_INSPECT_SCHEMA EIC ON EIC.FLOW_ID=EF.FLOW_ID LEFT JOIN T_EQUIPMENT_INSPECT EI ON EI.INSPECT_SCHEMA_ID=EIC.INSPECT_SCHEMA_ID WHERE EI.INSPECT_ID=INSPECT_ID )

property.name: depName
property.formula: (SELECT CASE WHEN D.DEP_LEVEL=3 THEN D.DEP_NAME WHEN D.DEP_LEVEL=4 THEN D1.DEP_NAME+'/'+D.DEP_NAME ELSE '' END FROM T_EQUIPMENT_INSPECT_SCHEMA EIS LEFT JOIN T_EQUIPMENT_FLOW EF ON EIS.FLOW_ID = EF.FLOW_ID LEFT JOIN T_EQUIPMENT E ON E.EQUIP_ID = EF.EQUIP_ID LEFT JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON D.DEP_ID = E.DEP_ID LEFT JOIN DEPARTMENT D1 ON D.PARENT_ID = D1.DEP_ID WHERE EIS.INSPECT_SCHEMA_ID =INSPECT_SCHEMA_ID )

property.name: rectifyResult
property.formula: (SELECT R.RECTIFY_RESULT FROM T_INSPECT_RECTIFY R WHERE R.INSPECT_RECTIFY_ID=INSPECT_RECTIFY_ID)

property.name: rectifyDate
property.formula: (SELECT R.RECTIFY_DATE FROM T_INSPECT_RECTIFY R WHERE R.INSPECT_RECTIFY_ID=INSPECT_RECTIFY_ID)

property.name: rectifyUsername
property.formula: (SELECT R.RECTIFY_USERNAME FROM T_INSPECT_RECTIFY R WHERE R.INSPECT_RECTIFY_ID=INSPECT_RECTIFY_ID)

property.name: rectifyIntroduce
property.formula: (SELECT R.RECTIFY_INTRODUCE FROM T_INSPECT_RECTIFY R WHERE R.INSPECT_RECTIFY_ID=INSPECT_RECTIFY_ID)

property.name: permissionFlag
property.formula: (SELECT E.PERMISSION_FLAG FROM T_EQUIPMENT_INSPECT_SCHEMA T,T_EQUIPMENT_DIARY ED, T_EQUIPMENT E WHERE T.EQUIP_DIARY_ID=ED.EQUIP_DIARY_ID AND E.EQUIP_ID=ED.EQUIP_ID AND T.INSPECT_SCHEMA_ID = INSPECT_SCHEMA_ID)

property.name: flowState
property.formula: (SELECT EF.FLOW_STATE FROM T_EQUIPMENT_INSPECT_SCHEMA EIS,T_EQUIPMENT_DIARY ED,T_EQUIPMENT_FLOW EF WHERE INSPECT_SCHEMA_ID=EIS.INSPECT_SCHEMA_ID AND EIS.EQUIP_DIARY_ID=ED.EQUIP_DIARY_ID AND EF.FLOW_ID=ED.FLOW_ID)

property.name: materialPractiName
property.formula: (SELECT P.MATERIAL_PRACTI_NAME FROM T_PROJECT P, T_EQUIPMENT_INSPECT_SCHEMA EIS, T_EQUIPMENT_DIARY ED WHERE EIS.INSPECT_SCHEMA_ID= INSPECT_SCHEMA_ID AND EIS.EQUIP_DIARY_ID = ED.EQUIP_DIARY_ID AND P.PROJECT_ID = ED.PROJECT_ID )
